content.raw: Sounds like there are multiple possible solutions to this. The overall issue should probably be called "Determine and document best practices for building gazebo in catkin workspaces". The worst case is everyone is rolling their own solution and wasting effort. When many people are working doing it (at a lab or company that uses gazebo+ros for example) it's really important to have a streamlined process that can be automated. Can @dirk-thomas or @wwoodall chime in about what might be the best way to do this?
